properties.entry: SELECT POI_DATE , POI_POINT , POI_CONTENT , ORDER_NO , MEM_ID FROM POINT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , NICKNAME = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? , BIRTH = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTH , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_TYPE , STATUS , BLACK_CONTENT , BLACK_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = ?
